name: Cube Runner (itch) (Vardan Davtyan)
description:
The main goal of the game is to go as far as possible, and we should not hit
purple walls and should not fall off the road. Bridges and Moving platforms help us not to fall into the abyss.
The Green Bridges slow down our speed a bit.
The game has Menu, Pause Menu, Sounds, Particles. 
It has 2 versions: Windows version and Android version. 
The game has very good graphics on Windows (there is also a version with some songs on Windows).
The Android version has the same functionality, but there are also colorful skins.
The game has interesting gameplay, good Visual and Sound Effects, also Menu has Visual and Sound Effects.
Windows version and Android version :)
WARNING: Android version doesn't supported for all devices
